extendedInfo.description: This app tells you which articles of clothing to match well together and what people associate your style to.Choose a color for your shirt and you will get suitable colors for your tie, jacket or pants. Every color combination has a meaning. Do you want to look trustful or sportive? Choose from over 100 associations. You can switch the picture to a female version and choose a color for a shirt, pants or coat. Features: - Change the color of a shirt, tie or pants in the picture. Try different combinations. - The app tells you, what meaning people associate with your choice of colors (e.g. sportive). - The smileys tell you, how well your colors match. Change your colors until all smileys are smiling. - The app tells you, which article of clothing you must change in order to match your selection. - Select an association from the list to achieve a specific impact (e.g. trustful).

reviews.title: Colors
reviews.comment: Great app just needs more colors and I wish you could subtract the jacket out of the picture.
reviews.author: A Google User
